scripts.build-debug: mkdir -p target && yarn -s cargo-build > ./target/out.ndjson && yarn -s copy-artifacts
scripts.build-release: mkdir -p target && yarn -s cargo-build-release > ./target/out.ndjson && yarn -s copy-artifacts
scripts.build-all: mkdir -p target && yarn -s cargo-build -- --workspace > ./target/out.ndjson && yarn -s copy-artifacts && yarn -s build-wasm
scripts.build-wasm: yarn -s install-wasm-pack && node scripts/build-wasm.js library_config && node scripts/build-wasm.js datadog-js-zstd
